channel.title: People on Yet another blog restart
channel.description: Recent content in People on Yet another blog restart

item.title: Oh, you had other plans?
item.description: Disclaimer: Made up. Especially the people and their names. There’s this thing you wanted to do for quite some time now. A hike across some pass in the Alps with a bit of via ferrata? You have the route figured out, the forecast is promising, the weather in the past weeks was just right (there won’t be snow, avalanches, mud), you have the holidays booked, no last minute fire at work.
